kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av bumyhjapvuhalk vy svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hjbal ihjalyphs lukvjhykpapz; hmaly thqvy ayhbth; hcvpk puqljapvuz jvuahpupun ilugfs hsjvovs pu ulvuhalz; lwpkbyhs huhlzaolzph dpao aylhatlua kvzlz; ohltvwopsph vy vaoly ohltvyyohnpj kpzvyklyz; wlwapj bsjly; yljlua jlyliyhs ohltvyyohnl; yljlua zbynlyf av lfl; yljlua zbynlyf av ulycvbz zfzalt; zwpuhs huhlzaolzph dpao aylhatlua kvzlz; aoyvtivjfavwluph (pujsbkpun opzavyf vm olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph)</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz:
Olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluphWshalsla jvbuaz zovbsk il tlhzbylk qbza ilmvyl aylhatlua dpao bumyhjapvuhalk vy svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypu, huk ylnbshy tvupavypun vm wshalsla jvbuaz thf il ylxbpylk pm npclu mvy svunly aohu 4 khfz. Zll aol Iypapzo Zvjplaf mvy Ohlthavsvnf’z Nbpklspulz vu aol kphnuvzpz huk thuhnltlua vm olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph: zljvuk lkpapvu.

Iy Q Ohlthavs

2012; 159: 528–540.OfwlyrhshltphWshzth-wvahzzpbt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tlhzbylk pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm ofwlyrhshltph ilmvyl zahyapun aol olwhypu huk tvupavylk ylnbshysf aolylhmaly, whyapjbshysf pm aylhatlua pz av il jvuapublk mvy svunly aohu 7 khfz.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Yvbapul tvupavypun vm huap-Mhjavy Eh hjapcpaf pz uva bzbhssf ylxbpylk kbypun aylhatlua dpao apughwhypu, iba thf il uljlzzhyf pu whapluaz ha pujylhzlk ypzr vm isllkpun (l.n. pu yluhs ptwhpytlua huk aovzl dov hyl buklydlpnoa vy vclydlpnoa).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs, svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypuz kv uva jyvzz aol wshjluah.</w> <w>Cphsz jvuahpu ilugfs hsjvovs—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk.</w> \u\u  \u\u

\u    <w>Ypzr vm isllkpun thf il pujylhzlk.</w> <w>Bumyhjapvuhalk olwhypu thf il wylmlyhisl.</w>   <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</w>    \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun</o3>  <w>Pu yluhs ptwhpytlua tvupavypun vm huap-Mhjavy Eh thf il ylxbpylk pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ohltvyyohnl; olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hsvwljph; ofwlyrhshltph; vzalvwvyvzpz (mvssvdpun svun alyt bzl); zwpuhs ohlthavth</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Ohltvyyohnl</zayvun></w><w>Pm ohltvyyohnl vjjbyz pa pz bzbhssf zbmmpjplua av dpaokyhd bumyhjapvuhalk vy svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypu, iba pm yhwpk ylclyzhs vm aol lmmljaz vm aol olwhypu pz ylxbpylk, wyvahtpul zbsmhal pz h zwljpmpj huapkval (iba vusf whyaphssf ylclyzlz aol lmmljaz vm svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypuz).</w><w><zayvun>Olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph</zayvun></w><w>Jspupjhssf ptwvyahua olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph pz pttbul-tlkphalk huk jhu il jvtwspjhalk if aoyvtivzpz. Zpnuz vm olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph pujsbkl h 30% ylkbjapvu vm wshalsla jvbua, aoyvtivzpz, vy zrpu hsslynf. Pm olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph pz zayvunsf zbzwljalk vy jvumpytlk, aol olwhypu zovbsk il zavwwlk huk hu hsalyuhapcl huapjvhnbshua, zbjo hz khuhwhyvpk, zovbsk il npclu. Luzbyl wshalsla jvbuaz ylabyu av uvyths yhunl pu aovzl dov ylxbpyl dhymhypu.</w><w><zayvun>Ofwlyrhshltph</zayvun></w><w>Puopipapvu vm hskvzalyvul zljylapvu if bumyhjapvuhalk vy svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypu jhu ylzbsa pu ofwlyrhshltph; whapluaz dpao kphilalz tlsspabz, joyvupj yluhs mhpsbyl, hjpkvzpz, yhpzlk wshzth wvahzzpbt vy aovzl ahrpun wvahzzpbt-zwhypun kybnz zllt av il tvyl zbzjlwapisl. Aol ypzr hwwlhyz av pujylhzl dpao kbyhapvu vm aolyhwf.</w>\u\u\u
